GAMEPLAY_VitamincBigDescription.English: Bunch of vitamin c tablets in a box.
GAMEPLAY_VitamincBigDescription.Russian: Пачка таблеток витамина С в коробке.
GAMEPLAY_VitamincBigDescription.Italian: Un paio di pillole di vitamina C in una scatola.

GAMEPLAY_VitaminCADescription.English: Vitamin C tablets in blister pack
GAMEPLAY_VitaminCADescription.Italian: Pillole di vitamina C in una confezione blister.

GAMEPLAY_PaperBoxDescription.English: Old paper box, can be used as tinder.
GAMEPLAY_PaperBoxDescription.Russian: Старая бумажная коробка из под лекарств. Может быть использована в качестве трута.
GAMEPLAY_PaperBoxDescription.Turkish: Eski karton kutu, çıra olarak kullanılabilir.
GAMEPLAY_PaperBoxDescription.Italian: Vecchia scatola di carta, può essere utilizzata come esca per fuoco.
GAMEPLAY_PaperBoxDescription.German: Alte Pappschachtel, kann als Zunder verwendet werden.

GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.English: Sugar in a jar, don't mistake it for salt!
GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.Russian: Сахар в банке, не спутайте его с солью!
GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz şeker, Dikkat edin tuz ile karıştırmayın!
GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.Italian: Zucchero in un barattolo, non confonderlo con il sale!
GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.German: Zucker im Glas: Nicht zu verwechseln mit Salz!

GAMEPLAY_SleepingPillsBigDescription.English: Bunch of sleeping pills in a box.
GAMEPLAY_SleepingPillsBigDescription.Italian: Un paio di sonniferi in una scatola.

GAMEPLAY_RosehippotDescription.English: Bunch of rosehips in a pot, can be dried to make a delicious rosehip jam.
GAMEPLAY_RosehippotDescription.Russian: Гроздь шиповника в горшочке можно высушить, чтобы приготовить вкусное варенье из шиповника.
GAMEPLAY_RosehippotDescription.Turkish: Tencerede bir demet kuşburnu, lezzetli bir kuşburnu reçeli yapmak için kurutulabilir.
GAMEPLAY_RosehippotDescription.Italian: Un mucchio di rose canine in una pentola, può essere essicata per trasformarle in una deliziosa marmellata di rosa canina.
GAMEPLAY_RosehippotDescription.German: Ein Bund Hagebutten im Topf, kann getrocknet werden, um daraus eine leckere Hagebuttenmarmelade zu machen.

GAMEPLAY_RosehipsDriedDescription.English: Dried rosehips, can be eaten straight out of the pot or made into delicious rosehip jam.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipsDriedDescription.Russian: Сушеные плоды шиповника можно есть прямо из банки или приготовить из них вкусное варенье из шиповника.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipsDriedDescription.Turkish: Kurutulmuş kuşburnu, doğrudan yenebilir veya kuşburnu reçeli yapılabilir
GAMEPLAY_RosehipsDriedDescription.Italian: Rose canine essicate, puoi mangiarle direttamente dalla pentola oppure trasformarle in una deliziosa marmellata di rosa canina.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipsDriedDescription.German: Getrocknete Hagebutten können direkt aus dem Topf gegessen oder zu köstlicher Hagebuttenmarmelade verarbeitet werden.

GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.English: A delicious rosehip jam, let it rest for few days to achieve stronger flavor and thicker consistency.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.Russian: Чтобы получить вкусное варенье из шиповника, оставьте его на несколько дней, чтобы оно приобрело более насыщенный вкус и густую консистенцию.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.Italian: Una deliziosa marmellata di rosa canina, lasciala riposare per un paio di giorni per ottenere un gusto più forte e una consistenza più densa.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.German: Eine köstliche Hagebuttenmarmelade. Lassen Sie sie einige Tage ruhen, um ein kräftigeres Aroma und eine dickere Konsistenz zu erreichen.

GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamRested.Turkish: Kuşburnu reçeli, daha lezzetli olması için ve daha yoğun bir kıvam elde etmek için birkaç gün dinlendirin.

GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamRestedDescription.English: Thick Wild rosehip jam with sugar. There's nothing better than the sweet taste of childhood.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamRestedDescription.Russian: Густое варенье из шиповника с сахаром. Нет ничего лучше сладкого вкуса из детства.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamRestedDescription.Turkish: Şekerli kalın yabani kuşburnu reçeli. Çocukluğun tatlı tadından daha iyi bir şey yoktur.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamRestedDescription.Italian: Marmellata di rosa canina densa con zucchero. Niente di meglio che il dolce sapore dell'infanzia.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamRestedDescription.German: Dicke Hagebuttenmarmelade mit Zucker. Es gibt nichts Besseres als den süßen Geschmack der Kindheit.

GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.English: An old first aid kit, still has some bandages, antiseptic and painkillers.
GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.Russian: В старой аптечке первой помощи еще остались бинты, антисептики и обезболивающие.
GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.Turkish: Eski bir ilk yardım çantasında hâlâ birkaç bandaj, antiseptik ve ağrı kesici var.
GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.Italian: Un vecchio kit di pronto soccorso, ha ancora delle bende, antisettico e antidolorifici.
GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.German: Ein alter Erste-Hilfe-Kasten. Es sind noch einige Pflaster, Antiseptika und Schmerzmittel vorhanden.

GAMEPLAY_FentanylDescription.English: Syringe containing Fentanyl, drug used to mitigate pain
GAMEPLAY_FentanylDescription.Russian: Шприц, содержащий фентанил, препарат, используемый для смягчения боли
GAMEPLAY_FentanylDescription.Turkish: Ağrıyı hafifletmek için kullanılan Fentanil ilacı içeren şırınga
GAMEPLAY_FentanylDescription.Italian: Siringa con Fentanile, droga usata per mitigare il dolore
GAMEPLAY_FentanylDescription.German: Spritze mit Fentanyl, einem Medikament zur Schmerzlinderung

GAMEPLAY_CaffeinetabletsBigDescription.English: Bunch of caffeine tablets in a box.
GAMEPLAY_CaffeinetabletsBigDescription.Russian: Пачка таблеток с кофеином в коробке.
GAMEPLAY_CaffeinetabletsBigDescription.Italian: Un paio di compresse di caffeina in una scatola.

GAMEPLAY_CaffeinetabletsDescription.Italian: Compresse di caffeina in una confezione blister.

GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.English: An Experimental drug, contains tetrodotoxin, which completely shuts down central nervous system (blackout). Use at your own risk. It's higly recomended to take at least one week from last dosage.
GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.Russian: Экспериментальный препарат, содержащий тетродоксин, который полностью отключает центральную нервную систему (затемнение). Используйте на свой страх и риск. Настоятельно рекомендуется принимать по крайней мере через неделю после приема последней дозы.
GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.Turkish: Deneysel bir ilaçtır, merkezi sinir sistemini tamamen kapatan tetrodoksin içerir (bayılma). Kendi sorumluluğunuzda kullanın. Son dozajdan itibaren en az bir hafta geçmesi tavsiye edilir.
GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.Italian: Una droga sperimentale, contiene tetrodotossina, il quale causa un spegnimento completo del sistema nervoso centrale (blackout). Utilizzare a proprio rischio e pericolo. Consigliato di prendersi almeno una settimana dall'ultima somministrazione.
GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.German: Ein experimentelles Medikament, das Tetrodotoxin enthält, das das zentrale Nervensystem vollständig lahmlegt (Blackout). Die Anwendung erfolgt auf eigene Gefahr. Es wird dringend empfohlen, das Medikament nach der letzten Dosis mindestens eine Woche lang einzunehmen.
